meanings.definition: A type of dark, coarse-grained igneous rock
meanings.sent1: The geologist studied the gabbros to learn about their formation.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was made of gabbros, giving it a rugged appearance.
meanings.sent3: The gabbros in the quarry told jokes to each other while waiting to be mined.
meanings.sent4: The gabbros stood strong like ancient guardians of the earth.
meanings.sent5: The gabbros shimmered in the sunlight, revealing their hidden beauty.
